scripts.clearBuild: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build && mkdir build/public && mkdir build/public/images && mkdir build/public/images/dist && mkdir build/public/fonts && mkdir build/public/js
scripts.copyAssets: cp -R images/dist/ build/public/images/dist && cp -R fonts/ build/public/fonts && cp -R js/ build/public/js
scripts.copyFiles: cp *.html build/public/ && cp style.css build/public/ && cp *.json build/ && cp *.js build/public/
scripts.build: gulp sass && gulp js && gulp images && npm run clearBuild && npm run copyAssets && npm run copyFiles && npm run copyServer
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd build && now && now alias
